name: Nestables
summary: Nestables is an interactive crypto-collectible game for all ages, which will allow gamers to collect, trade and breed 3D ‘Cubes’, each of which has their own unique personality and physical traits. Interact with your Cubes through designing, creating and decorating their ‘Nest’. Task your Cube with collecting resources or building improvements for the Nest or allow them to relax and play.
